entries.description: Code Transformation: Address various issues in TransformationHub UX.
Code Transformation: Transform may fail if JAVA_HOME has leading or trailing whitespace
Chat: Q panel doesn't fit to its parent
Feature Development: update welcome message and menu item description for /dev command
Code Transformation: show error messages in chat
Code Transformation: Proposed changes not updated when multiple transformation jobs run in sequence.
Feature Development: Update error message for monthly conversation limit reach
Code Transformation: Omit Maven metadata files when uploading dependencies to fix certain build failures in backend.
Code Transformation: Refreshed UI during CodeTransformation
Chat: cmd + i to open chat
Right Click + no code selected shows Q context menu
Security Scan: Scans can now run on all files in the project
Chat: Updates quick action commands style and groupings
Code Transformation: add details about expected changes in transformation plan
Enable Amazon Q feature development and Amazon Q transform capabilities (/dev and /transform) for AWS Builder ID users.
Initial release
Chat: Added metric parameters to recordAddMessage telemetry event.
Security Scan: Scans can now run automatically when file changes are made
Chat: brief CodeLens to advertise chat
Security Scan: Send security issue to chat for explanation and fix
